ing: 1/4 cup frozen French fries, or to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "I just don't like eating plain eggs, so when I got this recipe from my grandmother it immediately became my favorite breakfast food."
ins: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir French fries in hot butter until browned and hot, 3 to 5 minutes. Add eggs and season with salt and black pepper; cook and stir until eggs are scrambled and set, 3 to 5 minutes.
